entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as a person who needs to get the post, introduced by Uncle Vernon's instruction.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who needs to get the post, introduced by Uncle Vernon's instruction and also by his own name being called out.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as a person giving instructions to Harry and Dudley, introduced by the context of the conversation.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon instructs Dudley to get the post, as mentioned in 'Make Dudley get it'.
Uncle Vernon also instructs Harry to get the post, as mentioned in 'Get the post, Harry'.
Dudley is instructed by Uncle Vernon to get the post, as mentioned in 'Make Dudley get it'.
Harry is also instructed by Uncle Vernon to get the post, as mentioned in 'Get the post, Harry'.
